root: ^Good day good sir! My name is Mothaniel, as you can see my shell has capsized and without passage back to shore I will surely die!
^Please may I ride with you for a while? I don’t need to go anywhere specific, all I need is some fresh mountain air and away from these sea slugs.
^When we land I’ll find a way to pay you back, I swear it. So what do you say?
